text: I'd like to speak of this memory...
But it's so faded now... as though nothing is left,
because it was so long ago, in my adolescent years.
Constantine Cavafy
"If you think you were slain by my hand Then send for me, Mother.
Bury me in the fires of hell.
Are these men my enemies?
There is no water without earth, no earth without water.
I beg forgiveness, and I repent.
Alerting all units,
it's been reported that another   watchman has gone missing.
Don Colombo, it's been a while   since we've heard from you.
Do you need supplies?
Colombo Quisquiza, Unit 8, Paramo Alto...
Your son F, has failed to check in.
There are reports of hostile   activity in the area."
To sin is to lack faith in God and a true love for one's neighbor.
Succumbing to ambition, greed, and the devil...
Sin hurts the true nature of man and undermines human solidarity.
War has no purpose; instead, we must...
...build peace and find harmony in our family.
A family is a group of individuals rife with defects
that God brings together in spite of their differences
so that they may develop tolerance, respect,
gratitude, patience, and forgiveness
doing for others what we would like them to do unto us
without demanding the perfection that we do not yet have.
We are born where we deserve, in order to grow and evolve.
Sin is living in hatred and resentment.
Sin is the loss of Paradise.
How long can we live with the misery of man,
with our innate wretchedness and our desire to deplete
devour and dominate everything around?
The time has come to surrender God will not lead us astray.
By orders of the Superior Command, all watchmen and guards must retreat.
You understand we ought to go. No crops, no cattle, no life.
Nobody wants to stay like this.
Tell your father that he should sell the land too.
They're paying quickly in US Dollars. There is no future here.
Rosa...
I will take you to her.
In the name of the Father and the Son Forever and ever
Our ancestors have been banished. We are not like them anymore
We no longer use their words We no longer have a language
We no longer can be fed I am your servant, the son of your mercy.
Massive dams displace millions of   people and destroy whole ecosystems.
Global warming is altering   the water cycle,
causing more severe and unpredictable   flooding and droughts...
Unregulated corporate privatization   threatens access to water for the poor.
Some governments fail to deliver water   where it is needed most.
These stresses have created   political and military conflicts
that will only get worse.
Ultimately, humanity is poisoning,
squandering and overburdening   water resources.
The result is that billions of people   lack access to clean water.
Millions of children die every year   from preventable water born diseases.
Lack of clean water and basic sanitation   traps people in problem.
People are fighting and dying for it.
Attention: All community members are advised to not engage in conflict.
And now the moment   you have been waiting for.
It's time to study, it's time to learn,   it's time to have fun.
It's English time.   Right here, right now.
Now, repeat after me:   The morning is sunny.
The morning is sunny.
Very well. Now, repeat after me:
The afternoon is rainy.    The afternoon is rainy.
Very well!   Now repeat after me:
The night is cold.    The night is cold.
I am very happy.    I am very happy.
Sumapaz here, over. Clear and present danger, over.
Sumapaz here, over. Clear and present danger, over.
Can anybody hear me?
Can anybody hear me?
Get me out!
Can anybody hear me?
Nothing belongs to us, Mother I rather remain quiet than lie.
A dagger plunged into my chest is tearing me apart
splitting me between my shoulders.
I yearn to taste the salt of the sea
My veins are entwined with the soil of this land.
The end draws ever near to snatch my soul,
crumbling my bones and reducing me to dust.
Will I be forgiven? My father is already with you.
Hello, hello...
Colombo or son, whoever can hear us.   We are being slaughtered!
to my father, in memoriam
